title: FS: Tolstoi Wilhelm, Wiltse/Overall miscut, Manning, Bergen, Dessau
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: FS: Tolstoi Wilhelm, Wiltse/Overall miscut, Manning, Bergen, Dessau
posts.post_content:
All prices include shipping to the continental US. Payment through Paypal FF. An "I'll take it" trumps on-going negotiations.

Please let me know if you would like me to email you better scans.


Wiltse miscut that shows part of Overall (see this thread: [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showpost.php?p=1461280&postcount=303):[/url] $75


Manning, looks like it got the gray layer twice, definitely a lot of extra ink on this one


Wilhelm Tolstoi (bottom right on front has the top of what looks like a very small "5" stamp): $old


Bergen catching (water stain on front): $old


Dessau: [STRIKE]$25[/STRIKE] $22
I'll take the Brown, if still available.
Bump to remove sold cards. Feel free to make an offer, especially if you want multiple cards.
Wilhelm Tolstoi (bottom right on front has the top of what looks like a very small "5" stamp): $75 $65 I'll Take it! If available thanks

I'll take Bergen.
Email to come.
